pages.text: The most interesting ability of the Endermen is, without exception, their teleportation. However, to determine the destination of the teleportation, you must first take a snapshot of the position. After that, you can return to the location at any time.$(br)Endermen don't have to do that - but why?
With the first use of the Ender Splice (or a whole stack full) it saves the current position.$(br)With the second use it teleports you back to the saved location.
